name: AmericanCancerSociety
0:
”Alexa, open American Cancer Society”
”Alexa, ask American Cancer Society about lung cancer”
”Alexa, start American Cancer Society”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: american cancer society
Developer Terms of Use
des:
At the American Cancer Society, we're on a mission to free the world from cancer. Until we do, we'll be funding and conducting research, sharing expert information, supporting patients, and spreading the word about prevention. All so you can live longer — and better.

The American Cancer Society Skill will help aid in these efforts by allowing us to provide answers on general cancer information, the most commonly diagnosed cancers and treatment options.

You can receive information on various cancer topics by saying, "Alexa, open American Cancer Society" and then explore a topic by stating:

"General Cancer Information"
"Different Types of Cancer"
"Treatment Options"
"Support Programs and Services"

Each topic will set you down a path to explore more information on that particular topic.

General Cancer Information:
What is cancer?
Is cancer contagious?
What are the stages of cancer?

Different Types of Cancer:
Lung
Breast
Colorectal
Prostate
Skin

Treatment Options:
Tell me about cancer surgery
What is a biopsy?
How does radiation therapy work?
What are the side effects of radiation therapy?
What is cancer staging?
Tell me about immunotherapy

Support Programs and Services:
24/7 Helpline
Free Lodging for Cancer Treatment
Breast Cancer Support Program
Rides to Cancer Treatment


Disclaimer:
The content provided by this skill is for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for a professional medical opinion, advice, treatment or diagnosis. This skill should not be used if you’re in a life-threatening or emergency medical situation. Calling your local emergency number is almost always the fastest way to get lifesaving treatment.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
